DOC.brief_summary: A prospective study will be performed to compare the clinical outcome after total knee arthroplasty (TKA) using two different alignment systems: an extramedullary system versus an intramedullary system. The extramedullary femoral alignment system is newly designed. These two systems are used to make the distal femoral resection in 100 patients in a random order.
DOC.brief_title: Femoral Extramedullary Versus Intramedullary Alignment Systems in Total Knee Arthroplasty
